rationale: Your team has incredible RB depth with Irving, Etienne, and Hubbard, allowing you to move a top asset like Breece Hall to address your QB position. Jordan Love provides a massive and reliable upgrade for your QB2/Superflex spot over a rookie or Geno Smith, giving you a powerful duo with Lamar Jackson. You also get a high-upside RB in Austin Ekeler for depth. This trade leverages your RB strength to significantly improve your starting QB lineup.
